title: Sleep Country Canada Qtrly Basic EPS $0.39​

organizations.name: reuters) - sleep country canada holdings inc

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc :
* SLEEP COUNTRY CANADA REPORTS STRONG PERFORMANCE FOR FOURTH QUARTER OF 2017
* SLEEP COUNTRY CANADA HOLDINGS INC QTRLY ‍REVENUE INCREASED 13.4% TO $153.6 MILLION FROM $135.4 MILLION IN Q4 2016​
* SLEEP COUNTRY CANADA HOLDINGS INC QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE ‍$0.42​
* SLEEP COUNTRY CANADA HOLDINGS INC QTRLY BASIC ‍EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39​ Source text for Eikon:
